name: Executive Brawl
description:
Executive Brawl is a fighting game where you may play as real life characters.

Early Access

This game is in alpha stage right now, and the experience may seem very basic.

Future Updates:

  • More attack options, kicks, jabs, and combos are all under development.
  • Character Diversity: Each character should have their own unique traits and abilities that stand out from one another. Attack styles and strength/weaknesses should differ to make each character more important.
  • More Characters
  • Harder AI
  • Adventure Mode?

Characters:

Each character has a unique voice which is taken from real speeches.

Made By:

Graphics, design, and programming all done by me.

Made in Unity.
